title: Distribution of global animal health care market by species 2018
yAxis: Distribution of animal health care market volume
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Distribution of animal health care market volume for 2 number of Animal Types.
The maximum Distribution of animal health care market volume 62.0 is found at Animal Type Food animal and the minimum is found at Companion animal where Animal Type is 38.0.
The highest Animal Type Food animal has 24.0 more Distribution of animal health care market volume than the lowest Animal Type Companion animal.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Distribution of animal health care market volume for 2 number of Animal Types.
Animal Type Food animal has the highest Distribution of animal health care market volume and Companion animal has the lowest Distribution of animal health care market volume.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Distribution of animal health care market volume for 2 number of Animal Types.

max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Animal Type in the x axis and Distribution of animal health care market volume in the y axis.
The Distribution of animal health care market volume is appeared to be the highest at Animal Type Food animal and lowest at Animal Type Companion animal.
The Distribution of animal health care market volume of Animal Type Food animal is 1.63% larger than the minimum value at Companion animal.
Considered together, the average Distribution of animal health care market volume in all 2 Animal Types is roughly 50.0.
The Distribution of animal health care market volume is 100.0 if we add up values of all Animal Types.
